captain.name: Unknown (identity not revealed in this episode)

keyMoments.title: Roger Pirates Revealed in Flashback
keyMoments.description: The crew is shown for the first time in a flashback, with young Buggy and Shanks serving as apprentices aboard the Oro Jackson.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of the legendary crew that will be revealed as belonging to the Pirate King. This establishes the deep history connecting several important characters.

keyMoments.title: Rayleigh's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Silvers Rayleigh is shown aboard the Oro Jackson, though his identity and role are not yet revealed.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a legendary figure who will become crucial to the story.

keyMoments.title: Buggy's Devil Fruit Incident
keyMoments.description: The flashback shows the incident where Buggy accidentally consumed the Bara Bara no Mi aboard the Oro Jackson.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a pivotal moment that shaped Buggy's character and his relationship with Shanks.

statusHistory.reason: Crew disbanded at some point between flashback and present (details not yet revealed)

reveals.information: First appearance of the crew shown in flashback
Buggy and Shanks served as apprentices on this crew
Crew sailed on the Oro Jackson

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossbones behind it
jollyRoger.symbolism: Represents Luffy's signature straw hat and his dream to become Pirate King

keyMoments.title: Nami Officially Joins as Navigator
keyMoments.description: After witnessing Luffy's character and the crew's adventure in Orange Town, Nami officially agrees to join the Straw Hat Pirates as their navigator.
keyMoments.significance: The crew gains its third member and first female member. Nami's navigation skills are essential for reaching the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: Victory Over Buggy
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates defeat Buggy and liberate Orange Town from his terror.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's growing strength and Luffy's ability to defeat powerful Devil Fruit users.

statusHistory.reason: Crew is actively recruiting and adventuring

reveals.information: Nami officially joins as the crew's navigator
Crew demonstrates ability to defeat Devil Fruit users through teamwork
